wpPost.title: How to Integrate Freshsales with Magento 2
wpPost.content:
Are you looking for ways to strengthen customer relationships and improve sales in your Magento 2 store? Integrating a CRM system like Freshsales can be a game-changer. With over 40,000 satisfied customers worldwide, Freshsales has been called an “excellent entry-level CRM for sales teams” by Forbes.


In this guide, we’ll show you step-by-step how to integrate Freshsales with Magento 2 store. You’ll learn how this integration can help your sales team maintain strong customer relationships, improve communication, and increase sales. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to boost your business’s success. Let’s get started!

How to Integrate Freshsales with Magento 2: A Step-by-Step Guide to Boosting Your Sales Team’s Success

What is Freshsales?

Freshsales, a sales CRM platform provided by Freshworks, offers a range of benefits when it comes to streamlining processes, accelerating deal closures, and gaining valuable customer behavior insights. This platform serves businesses across various industry verticals and provides an effective solution for managing customer interactions, both new and existing.

It’s important to highlight that Freshsales is specifically designed to cater to the needs of sales teams. As part of Freshworks’ suite of CRM offerings, it complements other software such as Freshdesk for customer engagement, Freshmarketer for marketing, and Freshservice for IP support.

Thanks to its intuitive and customizable interface, Freshsales seamlessly integrates with your Magento 2 store. This integration is particularly advantageous for individuals who are new to CRM software, as it requires minimal team training for setup.

To learn how to integrate Freshsales with Magento 2 and leverage the benefits of this powerful combination, follow the guidelines below and explore the steps for a successful Freshsales Magento 2 integration.

5 key advantages of integrating Freshsales with Magento 2

Combining the power of Freshsales with the Magento platform, you can access all important data, including customer information, purchase history, buying and consumption patterns, and customer concerns at any time.

Here are five reasons why you need to integrate Freshales with your Magento 2:

  •  A single source of all information. The integration you make with Freshsales will enrich your store with data. This helps your Magento store become a one-stop place for all your essential business information.
  •  You can notice a significant increase in the sales reps’ productivity. Integrating Freshsales with your Magento 2 store gives a significant boost to your sales reps. This union automates conversations with leads and customers, getting insights, sending out emails, and other sales tasks. A significant advantage of this integration is that any task performed is automatically logged, thus helping you eliminate duplicates.
  •  Your store stays organized. Via this integration, you’ll get a clean and straightforward sales process that can be easily tracked and organized. Any changes made in Freshsales are automatically synced to your Magento store and vice versa.
  •  The integration helps your reps stay updated. This integration helps your reps stay up to date with information, such as changes made to conversation history, lead data, and tickets raised.
  •  The integration enhances your support. Integrating Freshsales with your Magento 2 store can equip your support team with all customer data to assist them better.

How to integrate Freshsales with Magento 2

If you’re looking to integrate Freshsales with Magento 2, you have a few options. One way to get started is by using a pre-built extension or integration service. Many extension providers offer customization services, so you can tailor the integration to meet your specific business needs.

  •  One option is to use the Magento 2 Freshsales integration extension, which is already standardized based on the most common requirements. This extension can be easily added to your cart and integrated with your Magento 2 store. It typically costs a few hundred dollars, not including customization or installation services.
  •  Alternatively, you can opt for a Magento 2 integration service. With this option, Magento experts will provide you with solutions to connect Freshsales with your Magento 2 store. They will consult with you, implement the integration, and customize it to your specific business requirements. Fees for this service may be charged as a fixed sum or hourly.

Integrate Freshsales with Magento 2 via an extension

Integrating Freshsales with your Magento 2 store can be done quickly and easily with the help of an extension. Mageplaza offers the Magento 2 Freshsales integration extension, which is both user-friendly and highly effective.

To set up the integration, you only need to follow two simple steps:

Get your account API

  • Visit this link to create a Freshsales account.
  • After completing your information, click Sign up for free.
  • To get your account API, click your profile picture and choose Settings > API Settings.
  • Copy the API Key so that you can paste it into Magento later.

Integrate Freshsales with Magento 2 via an integration service

In some cases, ready-made integration extensions may not fully meet your unique requirements. This is when customization becomes essential. Each integration is unique and often requires the expertise of a skilled developer to create the necessary code for the Magento-Freshsales integration.

To ensure a seamless and successful integration process, you have the option to choose a reliable Magento integration service. This allows you to save time and have the confidence that experienced professionals will handle the Freshsales integration for you.

Conclusion

Integrating Freshsales with Magento 2 offers numerous advantages for your business, such as streamlining processes, expediting deal closures, and gaining valuable customer insights. To achieve a successful integration, you can utilize the Magento 2 Freshsales integration extension or seek assistance from a professional Magento integration service. This allows you to tailor the integration to meet your specific business requirements. Whether you opt for a pre-built extension or a customized integration, integrating Freshsales with Magento 2 empowers your sales team to establish seamless customer relationships and foster customer loyalty. To learn how to integrate Freshsales with Magento 2, follow the steps above for a smooth and effective integration process.

If you choose to use a pre-built extension, it’s important to know how to install it properly. You can install the Magento 2 Freshsales integration extension by following these simple steps on how to install an extension from Magento 2 Marketplace. With this knowledge, you’ll be well on your way to integrating Freshsales with your Magento 2 store and enjoying the benefits it provides.
